snippet.title: Take companies to court over price hikes
snippet.content: WHERE will it end? What's next? Proof of where you were conceived and to satisfy the perfectionists after a holiday abroad, maybe a pregnancy test on arrival at customs. Or will a declaration on the card alongside banned imports be sufficient. All this waste of time which should be spent on taking the companies to court to justify their price increases being blamed on the costs of renewable energy. Anyone watching the news and the lady whose weekly cost of electricity and gas would rise to $176 if she didn't contact the supplier to arrange a better deal. Now there's a company that needs to prove where they were conceived. Not on this planet for sure.
